thread.title: Lord Kuber Aarti Lyrics: Significance of Chanting This Mantra | Spirituality News, Times Now
thread.title_full: Lord Kuber Aarti Lyrics: Significance of Chanting This Mantra | Spirituality News, Times Now

author: TN Lifestyle Desk
title: Lord Kuber Aarti Lyrics: Significance of Chanting This Mantra | Spirituality News, Times Now
text: Lord Kuber Aarti Lyrics: Significance of Chanting This Mantra When this prayer, or Aarti, is sung, it praises Lord Kuber and asks for his help in bringing wealth, success, and happiness to the people who sing it. People believe that by singing this song, they show thankfulness and ask Lord Kuber for both material and spiritual wealth. Lord Kuber Photo : iStock Lord Kuber is known in Hindu stories as the god of wealth and good fortune. Devotees sing a special prayer called Lord Kuber Aarti to ask for his blessings of money and stability. When this prayer, or Aarti, is sung, it praises Lord Kuber and asks for his help in bringing wealth, success, and happiness to the people who sing it. People believe that by singing this song, they show thankfulness and ask Lord Kuber for both material and spiritual wealth. Lord Kuber Aarti Lyrics in English Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Swami Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Sharan pade bhagaton ke, Bhandar Kuber bhare Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Shiv bhakton mein bhakt Kuber bade, Swami bhakta Kuber bade Daitya danav manav se Kayi kayi yuddh lade Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Swarn simhasan baithe Sir par chhattra phire Swami sir par chhattra phire Yogini mangal gave Sab jai jaikar kare Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Gada trishul haath mein Shastra bahut dhare Swami shastra bahut dhare Dukh bhaya sankat mochan Dhanush tankar bhare Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Bhanti bhanti vyanjan bahut bane Swami vyanjan bahut bane Mohan bhog lagavein Saath mein urad chane Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Bal buddhi vidya data Hum teri sharan pade Swami hum teri sharan pade Apne bhakt janon ke Saare kaam sanware Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Mukut mani ki shobha Motiyan haar gale Swami motiyan haar gale Agar kapur ki baati Ghee ki jyot jale Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare Yaksha Kuber ji ki aarti jo koi nar gaave Swami jo koi nar gaave Kahat Prempal swami Manavanchhit phal paave Om Jai Yaksh Kuber hare [Latest News](https://www.timesnownews.com/latest-news) End of Article Subscribe to our daily Newsletter!
